E000 0000: Startup failure
(1) Check the connectors of the Fixing Assembly. (J101, J1011, J552 and J702) (2) Replace the Fixing Assembly. (3) Replace the Engine Controller PCB.
Abnormal high temperature
1) Check the connectors of the Fixing Assembly. (J101, J1011, J552 and J702) (2) Replace the Fixing Assembly. (3) Replace the Engine Controller PCB.
Abnormal low temperature
(1) Check the connectors of the Fixing Assembly. (J101, J1011, J552 and J702) (2) Replace the Fixing Assembly. (3) Replace the Engine Controller PCB.
Fixing heater drive circuit error
(1) Check the connectors of the Fixing Assembly. (J101, J1011, J552 and J702) (2) Replace the Fixing Assembly. (3) Replace the Engine Controller PCB.
Scanner area failure (in Scanner Motor, Laser Unit, or BD detection)
(1) Check the connectors of the Laser Scanner Unit. (J1, J542 J571 and J923) (2) Replace the Laser Scanner Unit. (3) Replace the Engine Controller PCB.
ROM read/write error (error in storing setting values in user mode/ service mode/factory mode)

When the same error repeatedly occurs although the power is turned OFF and then ON for several times, execute the following remedies. (1) Update the firmware of the Main Controller PCB. (2) Replace the Main Controller PCB.
Insufficient lamp light intensity (The light intensity is at the reference level or below.)

When the same error repeatedly occurs although the power is turned OFF and then ON for several times, execute the following remedies. (1) Check the connection between the Main Controller PCB and the CIS Unit. (J2) (2) Replace CIS Unit. (3) Replace the Main Controller PCB.
Insufficient lamp light intensity (The light intensity is partially at the reference level or below.)

When the same error repeatedly occurs although the power is turned OFF and then ON for several times, execute the following remedies. (1) Check the connection between the Main Controller PCB and the CIS Unit. (J2) (2) Replace CIS Unit.
Communication error with CCU/modem, or no FAX Board installed on FAX model
When the same error repeatedly occurs although the power is turned OFF and then ON for several times, execute the following remedies. (1) Replace the Main Controller PCB.
Language file size error
When the same error repeatedly occurs although the power is turned OFF and then ON for several times, execute the following remedies. Install the set of the Main controller firmware.
Engine ID error.(Invalid engine connection was detected.)

When the same error repeatedly occurs although the power is turned OFF and then ON for several times, execute the following remedies. (1) Check the Main Controller PCB. (2)Update the firmware of the Main Controller PCB. (3)Update the firmware of the Engine Controller PCB.
